subject: Olympic Games (2024)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The city’s bid underestimated costs for hosting the 2024 Games, potentially leaving Massachusetts taxpayers on the hook for significant cost overruns, according to a state-funded report.
snippet: The city’s bid underestimated costs for hosting the 2024 Games, potentially leaving Massachusetts taxpayers on the hook for significant cost overruns, according to a state-funded report.
